title: NotedSource - Research Insights & Hiring
description: We have NotedSource Insights, which leverages AI to provide solutions to complex scientific problems your organization is facing by analyzing over 220 million research papers. The level of detail goes far beyond the capabilities of tools like ChatGPT as a reference point. Once you find a meaningful answer or solution, you have the option to convert that to a collaboration request to work with an actual researcher. Our existing network consists of over 6,000 experts worldwide already.
